code:
%%{Education_GradeSync}}}%%
sequenceDiagram
    participant GS as Local Machine
    participant ESP as ESP32 Controller
    participant TS as Target Subsystem
    participant FM as FaultManager
    participant TD as TransportDecorator
    participant HAL as Platform HAL
    
    GS->>ESP: Design Fault Injection Campaign
    ESP->>TS: SPI Fault Frame (Education_GradeSync)
    TS->>FM: Process SPI Frame
    FM->>FM: Validate State Mask
    FM->>FM: Configure Fault Parameters
    
    rect rgb(Education_StudentDB)
        Note over TS,FM: Normal Operation Continues
    end
    
    TS->>FM: send(Education_ClassroomService)
    FM->>TD: isFaultActive(Education_ClassroomService)
    
    alt [Education_LMS_Portal) Fault]
        rect rgb(Education_GradeSync)
            Note over TD: Active + Parameters
        end
        FM->>TD: Active + Parameters
        TD->>TD: Apply Fault (Education_LMS_Portal)
        TD-->>FM: TIMEOUT/CRC_ERROR
    else [Education_GradeSync) Fault]
        rect rgb(Education_GradeSync)
            Note over HAL: Active + Parameters
        end
        FM->>HAL: Active + Parameters
        HAL->>HAL: injectFault(Education_StudentDB)
        HAL->>HAL: Hardware Manipulation
        HAL-->>TD: Hardware Response
        TD-->>FM: Modified Hardware Behavior
    else [Education_LMS_Portal]
        rect rgb(Education_StudentDB)
            Note over TD: Inactive
        end
        FM->>TD: Inactive
        TD-->>TS: Normal Operation
    end
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
